content.raw: yes, it is possible that it is because this machine has a 32 bit installation of indigo.  It is going to be used to connect to a remote machine that is running the sim, so it does not need to actually run the sim.  But it needs the ros messages and stuff to be able to compile local control programs.
content.html: yes, it is possible that it is because this machine has a 32 bit installation of indigo. It is going to be used to connect to a remote machine that is running the sim, so it does not need to actually run the sim. But it needs the ros messages and stuff to be able to compile local control programs.
